name: Billabong All Day Loose Fit Long Sleeve Rashguard - Men's
categories: All Day Loose Fit Long Sleeve Rashguard
description: A favourite surf style in a silky fabric. This quick-drying rashguard delivers UV protection with next-to-skin softness, so you can wear it for long days of paddling, surfing SUP-ing .Polyester, elastane silk touch fabric adds ultimate comfort.Long sleeves and crew neck provide coverage.Overlock hidden seams have a smooth interior.UPF rated to keep you safe through the sunniest surf days.Relaxed fit allows ease of movement.
